name: checkpoint-management-console
label: CheckPoint Management Console
description: CheckPoint Management Console helps you to configure and view the security policy and objects in a Security Management Server or Multi Domain Server using CLI tools and web-services.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Specify the server URL of the CheckPoint Management Console server to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Credentials
fields.name: auth_type
fields.description: Select the type of credentials that you want to provide.

Username and Password.title: Username
Username and Password.name: username
Username and Password.description: Specify the Username to access the CheckPoint Management Console server to connect and perform the automated operations.

Username and Password.title: Password
Username and Password.name: password
Username and Password.description: Specify the Password to access the CheckPoint Management Console server to connect and perform the automated operations.

API Key.title: API Key
API Key.name: api_key
API Key.description: Specify the API Key to access the CheckPoint Management Console server to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.description: Retrieves a detailed list of hosts based on the parameters that you have specified.
operations.title: Get Hosts List

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.name: filter
parameters.tooltip: Specify the search expression to filter objects. The provided text should be exactly the same as it would be given in SmartConsole Object Explorer. The logical operators in the expression ('AND', 'OR') should be provided in capital letters. The search involves both a IP search and a textual search in name, comment, tags etc.
parameters.description: Specify the search expression to filter objects. The provided text should be exactly the same as it would be given in SmartConsole Object Explorer. The logical operators in the expression ('AND', 'OR') should be provided in capital letters. The search involves both a IP search and a textual search in name, comment, tags etc.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of objects that should be returned. The value should be between 1 to 500. Default value is 50.
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of objects that should be returned. The value should be between 1 to 500. Default value is 50.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: Specify the offset, i.e. the number of results to skip initially. Default value is 0.
parameters.description: Specify the offset, i.e. the number of results to skip initially. Default value is 0.

parameters.title: Order
parameters.name: order
parameters.tooltip: Specify the order, it sorts the results by search criteria. Automatically sorts the results by Name, in the ascending order.
parameters.description: Specify the order, it sorts the results by search criteria. Automatically sorts the results by Name, in the ascending order.

parameters.title: Show Membership
parameters.name: show-membership
parameters.tooltip: Indicates whether to calculate and show 'groups' field for every object in reply.
parameters.description: Indicates whether to calculate and show 'groups' field for every object in reply.

parameters.title: Details Level
parameters.name: details-level
parameters.tooltip: Specify the details level. The level of detail for some of the fields in the response can vary from showing only the UID value of the object to a fully detailed representation of the object.
parameters.description: Specify the details level. The level of detail for some of the fields in the response can vary from showing only the UID value of the object to a fully detailed representation of the object.

parameters.title: Domains To Process
parameters.name: domains-to-process
parameters.tooltip: Indicates which domains to process the commands on. It cannot be used with the details-level full, must be run from the System Domain only and with ignore-warnings true.
parameters.description: Indicates which domains to process the commands on. It cannot be used with the details-level full, must be run from the System Domain only and with ignore-warnings true.
